title: PetsVital
description: This project consists of an application that allows users to manage the care of their pets. Currently my team and I are working on mobile and web design planning and we finished the low-fidelity and high-fidelity prototypes. I nivite to know more about this project in my linkedIN, where we upload project updates every week.
